intro: Stelis laevis, commonly known as the smooth stelis, is a species of orchid native to Southeast Asia. It is characterized by its slender, upright growth habit and produces clusters of small, white to pale pink flowers. The plant typically grows on trees or rocks, exhibiting an epiphytic lifestyle. Its leaves are革质 (leathery) and arranged in a rosette pattern, which helps in water retention. Stelis laevis is valued in horticulture for its elegant appearance and relatively easy care requirements.
